hero.title: Your home in Puebla starts here
hero.subtitle: Discover safe and comfortable spaces designed for international students. Live the experience of studying in Mexico with total tranquility.

about.title: About Puebla Housing
about.subtitle: Your home away from home
about.description: Puebla Housing is the number 1 organization in Puebla specialized in accompanying international students in their installation process, we offer an integral service that connects students with verified safe and comfortable accommodation options, as well as cultural activities that foster integration and enrich their experience in Mexico.

welcomePack.heroSubtitle: With our Welcome Pack, your arrival will be unforgettable and full of unique experiences.
welcomePack.includedServicesDesc: Pick-up service at Puebla airport and bus terminal.
welcomePack.salsaClassesDesc: 4 salsa classes to learn Latin rhythms and meet other students in a fun environment.
welcomePack.cookingClassDesc: Learn to cook traditional Mexican dishes with a local chef. An authentic culinary experience.
welcomePack.totalComfortDesc: Quality bedding included and regular cleaning service. Everything ready for you to feel at home from day one.
welcomePack.exclusiveDiscountsDesc: FiftyFifty Card with 50% discount at the best restaurants in CDMX and Puebla.
welcomePack.step1Desc: We pick you up at Puebla airport with a private and comfortable transportation service.
welcomePack.step2Desc: We accompany you to your new home, introduce you to your roommates, the house host, and give you a house tour.
welcomePack.step3Desc: Welcome event with other international students. Meet your new community!
welcomePack.ctaSubtitle: and start living Mexico from the moment you land.

aboutPage.heroSubtitle: We are an organization dedicated to facilitating the arrival and stay of international students in Puebla. Our goal is to help you find a safe, comfortable place and to build a community that accompanies you throughout your experience.
aboutPage.missionTitle: Your new chapter in Puebla starts here.
aboutPage.missionDesc1: At Puebla Housing, we understand the challenges international students face when arriving in a new city. Therefore, we accompany them in their arrival process and support them in finding comfortable accommodation options that meet their needs.
aboutPage.missionDesc2: We connect students with various accommodation alternatives and promote a community where they can integrate, share experiences, and feel welcome from their first day in Puebla.
aboutPage.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide our work and commitment to students.
aboutPage.safetyDesc: We act with transparency and sincerity in all our interactions, providing clear and truthful information about our houses and services.
aboutPage.communityDesc: We are committed to offering exceptional service at every stage of the process, from housing search to support throughout your stay.
aboutPage.support247Desc: We put people at the center of everything we do, recognizing and valuing the unique experience of each international student.
aboutPage.localExperienceDesc: We share our knowledge and resources selflessly, helping students integrate and feel welcome in Puebla.
aboutPage.servicesSubtitle: Everything we do is focused on facilitating your experience as an international student in Puebla.
aboutPage.housingAdvisoryDesc: We help you find safe and comfortable housing options that fit your budget and needs.
aboutPage.arrivalSupportDesc: We pick you up at the bus terminal upon your arrival in Puebla and accompany you to your new home.
aboutPage.culturalIntegrationDesc: We organize events, excursions and activities that allow you to learn about Mexican culture and connect with other students.
aboutPage.studentNetworkDesc: We connect international students with each other, creating a community of mutual support during their stay in Puebla.
aboutPage.communityDesc1: We believe that the experience of studying abroad goes beyond finding a place to live. That's why we organize events, excursions and activities that allow you to meet other international students and create lasting friendships.
aboutPage.communityDesc2: Our student network connects you with people from all over the world who are going through the same experience as you, creating a mutual support system during your stay in Puebla.
aboutPage.ctaTitle: Ready to start your adventure in Puebla?
aboutPage.ctaSubtitle: We are here to help you every step of the way. Contact us and discover how we can facilitate your arrival in Puebla.

property.noRoomsRegistered: This property does not have any rooms registered yet.
property.propertyDescription: This property has {count} {types} rooms, perfect for students looking for a comfortable and safe environment. The strategic location near universities and essential services guarantees a complete and convenient student living experience.
property.fullAccess: Full access to all common areas
property.contactFormDesc: Fill out the form and we will contact you soon to help you with your reservation.
property.cancellationPolicyDesc: Free cancellation up to 30 days before check-in. After that, a 50% cancellation fee will apply.
